item.title: Josh Groban - What Child Is This?
item.description:
What Child is This by Josh Groban. It has been lowered by 1 semitone so young musicians can play along, also it’s just the first two verses and fades out at the key change. For educational use. Chords Used: Dm C A F
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Josh Groban - Believe - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of D. Lowered from the original key of E.
As performed by Josh Groban.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Josh Groban - Believe - Key of D
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D. Lowered from the original key of E.
As performed by Josh Groban.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
